TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteValueExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 检索与路由页中的指定 URL 参数对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value that corresponds to a specified URL parameter in a routed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以使用标记将服务器控件的属性设置为路由页中某个 URL 参数的值。The class makes it possible to use markup to set the property of a server control to the value of one of the URL parameters in a routed page. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用标记显示 URL 参数的值 `searchterm` 。The following example shows how to use markup to display the value of the URL parameter `searchterm`. 路由是使用 `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` 作为 URL 模式来定义的。The route is defined by using `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` as the URL pattern. ``` ``` 如果通过 URL 请求页面 `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles` ，则 控件将显示 "自行车"。If the page is requested with the URL `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`, the control displays "Bicycles".

span.span: ASP.NET Routing

related.span: 如何：访问路由页中的 URL 参数

span.span: How to: Access URL Parameters in a Routed Page
ASP.NET Expressions Overview

span.span: The value that corresponds to the URL parameter that is specified for the current page.

returns.span: 如果 为 或者不是从 派生的，则此方法返回 。

span.span: The method returns if is or if it does not derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>` 在无编译页中遇到窗体的表达式时，ASP.NET 将调用此方法。ASP.NET calls this method when an expression of the form `<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 此方法 通过调用方法来重写 方法。This method overrides the method by calling the method. 它 从参数中获取对象 `context` ，并从参数获取表达式、控件类型和属性名称 `entry` 。It gets the object from the `context` parameter, and it gets the expression, the control type, and the property name from the `entry` parameter.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式用于在生成的页类中为属性赋值。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
An expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为页或控件创建 CodeDOM 时，将调用此方法。This method is called when the CodeDOM is created for a page or control. 返回的对象表示要添加到生成的页类中的属性分配的代码表达式。The object that is returned represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用的属性检索指定值的相应值 `key` `page` 。This method retrieves the appropriate value for the specified `key` value by using the property of `page`. 然后，它使用 `controlType` 和 `propertyName` 值查找适当的类型转换器，以便将检索到的值转换为正确的类型。It then uses the `controlType` and `propertyName` values to find the appropriate type converter in order to convert the retrieved value into the correct type.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可在未编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否已 在类中实现方法，以便在未编译的页中返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class in order to return a value for the expression in a page that is not compiled. 类可以在未编译的页中计算表达式。The class can evaluate an expression in a page that is not compiled. 因此，它始终返回 `true` 。Therefore, it always returns `true`.
